text:
33 yo male with h/o large B cell lymphoma, s/p allogenic SCT  [**2166**], c/b
   severe GVHD of the skin and oral mucosa requring TPN for nutrition.
   recent admit last month with pneumococcal sepsis, presents from
   [**Hospital1 82**] with 1 day of fever to 102.5, N/V/abd pain.  Put on vanco,
   then [**Last Name (un) 430**].  Noted to be hypoxemic --> sats 94% on NRB.  Transferred to
   [**Hospital1 54**].  T 103 rectally here.  Sats 80% on RA, 94-95% on NRB.  SBPs
   trasniently to 70 --> SBP to 120s with 2L IVF.  No pressors required.
   Lactate 2.9.  RIJ placed in ED.  Multifocal infiltrates on CXR.
   Levoflox, 1mg of Dilaudid given in ED. Pt transferred to MICU for
   further management.
   [**2170-5-22**]- Pt started to desat into 80
s and placed on bipap.  Sats back
   up to 90
s but then dropped to high 80
s a few hours later intuabated
   at 0100..
   [**5-22**] Bronched for thick secretions
   [**5-26**] extubated
   Pneumonia, other
   Assessment:
   Extubated [**5-26**], on FT 40%, LSC diminished at bases, O2 sat >95%
   Action:
   Encourage C and DB
   Response:
   Pt able to loose secretions, needs help with yankeur.
   Plan:
   Cont w/ humidified O2 to help loosen secretions, wean to NC in am.
   Pain control (acute pain, chronic pain)
   Assessment:
   c/o back pain
   Action:
   Reposition, dilaudid 1mg IVx2 w/ minimal effect. Fent 50mcgx1 given w/
   min effect. Morphine 2mg + ativan 0.5mg given w/ good effect.
   Response:
   Pt resting comfortably.
   Plan:
   Cont pain management w/ morphine and ativan. ?OOB to chair in am
   Neuro:  a&ox3. afebrile. c/o back pain relieved w/ morphine.
   Resp: LSC, diminished at bases. Weak cough able to cough up secretions,
   No c/o SOB.
   CV: Bp stable, 120s-140s. NSR. +7L for LOS. ST 130s-140s when coughing.
   CVP 11-12/4-5 after diuresis.
   GI/GU: TPN, RISS w/ standing dose, +BS, no stool, foley patent and
   draining adequate urine. 20 of lasix given w/ good effect. No OGT/NGT
   r/t mucositis/GVHD. c/o N/V, zofran given.
